author: Rasul
title: This was funny
description: So, I saw this video on Youtube and this guy was teaching somethng called 'Naahd Daaht Jee Esss'. I mean, if you have to teach French, do it properly!

author: Rasul
title: Why React??
description: Why do you have to React to everything? I mean all i said was that the reactor was gonna blow. What's the fuss about?

author: Rasul
title: Thoughts on JavaScript
description: I love a hot cuppa Java with my donuts. Particularly when I'm reading the script for my new movie. Java and Script, mmmm, delicious!
